channel.title: Homepage on Cloud Native Day
channel.description: Recent content in Homepage on Cloud Native Day

item.title: Program
item.description: Talks will be selected by a committee of cloud native evangelists who have been active participants in local communities and have years of industry experience. Four of the eight talks selected will be presented by local experts. The single-track event will be bilingual and we will do our best to select equal amounts of English and French content. To submit a talk, please send your proposals to info@cloudnativeday.ca. Deadline for submission is May 1st, 2019 Detailed schedule coming soon

item.title: Sponsors
item.description: The organizers of Cloud Native Day 2019 would like to thank our sponsors, without whom this event would not be possible. Sponsoring Cloud Native Day gives your organization an opportunity to speak with developers, technical leaders, and decision makers from companies of all sizes and industries. Whether your goals include recruiting new talent, opening new markets, or connecting with your existing customers, this event will be the place to have those conversations with experts and leaders in tech innovation.
